name: PET 3D Monster Maze
description:
This is a remake of the classic ZX81 game 3D Monster Maze by Malcolm Evans. 

Explore a randomly created 3D maze trying to locate the exit and avoid the other inhabitant of the maze, a Tyrannosaurus Rex who is out to get you.

This will run on a 32K 40 column PET with BASIC 4 (4032), Mini PET or Mini PET 40/80. Mini PET 40/80 owner can also use 80 column mode for a special cheat / trainer mode which provides a Pterodactyl's eye view of the maze to help you find the exit and learn how Rex's simple brain works.

The file provided is a PRG file that can be loaded on a real PET or an emulator. 

Physical copies on cassette are also available from https://www.thefuturewas8bit.com/cas022.html

Rex lies in wait.
